name: Into the Perish
description:
Into the Perish is a VR Third person shooter experience, where you must overcome the Haunted woods of Oregon. Encounter creatures, challenge Bigfoot, and help you and your friends escape from the machinations of the coven. But beware, for there is more to the woods than meets the eye, and their hold runs deeper than their roots.

Developed by Virtual Monke Studios:

Artists:
Robin Falkner,
Joe-Austin Flynn,
Josh Hutchinson,
Zach Coates.

Designers:
Jack Davies,
James Pollard.

Programmers:
Mathew Shaw,
Ludo Bitti.

Writer:
Joe Dunn.

Music:
Kai Freeman.
